name: Alma
description: Guide the dead soul "Alma" through the eight levels of the Aztec underworld to reach the god and goddess of death, so that her soul may find peace. In this beautiful, hand illustrated 2D platformer, each level of the game corresponds to one of the eight levels of the Aztec underworld, Mictlan.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 16 MB RAM Storage: 16 MB available space
